snippet: In Ellen Umansky’s “The Fortunate Ones,” a painting that went missing in Nazi-occupied Vienna connects the lives of two women in contemporary Los Angeles....

headline.main: PETA Condemns N.H.L.’s Use of Real Penguins in Pittsburgh Pregame Show
headline.print_headline: Activists Condemn the Use of Live Penguins

lead_paragraph: In Ellen Umansky’s “The Fortunate Ones,” a painting that went missing in Nazi-occupied Vienna connects the lives of two women in contemporary Los Angeles.
